title: [Health] Plant-based meats tend to be ultra-processed and few are fortified with key micronutrients found in meat. Solely relying on plant-based meat could lead to iron, zinc, and B12 deficiencies over time if you are not boosting your intake of these essential nutrients from other sources.
[Medicine] Small molecule RAF265 as an antiviral therapy acts against HSV-1 (Herpes Simplex)
